chunks.zh: 惨痛经验，相亲一定要先见面再聊天，不然聊的再好都没用
chunks.en: Painful experience, you must meet in person before chatting on a blind date, otherwise it's useless no matter how well you chat.

chunks.zh: 过年家里给介绍了一个女生，老家是一个县里的，在一个城市工作，过年忙没顾得上见面，就加了微信，就说等去了工作城市再见面。
chunks.en: During the Spring Festival, my family introduced me to a girl. Her hometown is in a county and she works in a city. I was busy during the Spring Festival and didn't have time to meet her, so we added each other on WeChat and agreed to meet when I went to the city where she works.

chunks.zh: 然后微信上互相介绍了各自的条件，都觉得挺合适的，然后就日常闲聊，发现三观和日常爱好也都很一致，然后女生也很主动，聊天也逐渐升温，都到了讨论假如在一起多久订婚多久结婚的地步了，我就有种彷佛遇到了命中注定的那个人的感觉，然后周末终于都有空了，我就去找她见面，结果一见面直接被 Pass 了，就说和微信头像有差距（我头像是我刚毕业的时候拍的，瘦一些，精神一些），现在变成就说先当朋友了，唉，难受一天了~
chunks.en: Then we introduced our conditions to each other on WeChat and felt they were quite suitable. Then we chatted casually and found that our values and daily hobbies were very consistent. Then the girl was very proactive and the chat gradually heated up to the point where we were discussing when to get engaged and when to get married if we were together. I felt like I had met my soulmate. Then, finally, we were both free on the weekend, so I went to meet her. As a result, I was directly passed over as soon as we met. She said there was a difference between me and my WeChat profile picture (my profile picture was taken when I just graduated, when I was thinner and more energetic). Now she says we'll just be friends first. Sigh, I've been feeling down all day~

chunks.zh: 生产环境上线前，请注意：充分测试、监控准备、沟通协调、版本控制和数据备份。
chunks.en: Before going live in the production environment, please pay attention to: thorough testing, monitoring preparation, communication and coordination, version control, and data backup.

chunks.zh: 抽象老哥，原谅我不道德的笑了～
chunks.en: Abstract brother, forgive my immoral laughter~

chunks.zh: @duanxianze 你不发，我就默认你头像是你自拍~
chunks.en: @duanxianze If you don't post it, I'll assume your profile picture is a selfie~

chunks.zh: 没事儿，妹子没准会因为市场不景气回来舔 offer 的，放宽心，多看简历
chunks.en: It's okay, the girl might come back to lick the offer because of the sluggish market. Relax and look at more resumes.

chunks.zh: 男生拿自己照片当头像很少见呢，可能你以为自己挺帅。还好我是傻逼二次元头像没这种误会🐶
chunks.en: It's rare for guys to use pictures of themselves as profile pictures, maybe you thought you were pretty handsome. Luckily, I have a stupid anime profile picture and there's no such misunderstanding 🐶

chunks.zh: 会因为外貌就直接决绝一个人，仅凭外表就对一个人做出判断，忽视爱好思想三观品格精神契合度，只能说她价值观和认知深度很有限。
chunks.en: To directly reject someone based on appearance, to judge someone solely on appearance, ignoring hobbies, thoughts, values, character, and spiritual compatibility, can only mean that her values and cognitive depth are very limited.

chunks.zh: 恋爱的一开始只需要可爱，但要走的长久，就需要能力。
chunks.en: At the beginning of a relationship, only cuteness is needed, but to last, ability is needed.

chunks.zh: 任何美貌、身材，看久了都会审美疲劳。
chunks.en: Any beauty or figure will become aesthetically tiring after a long time.

chunks.zh: 人类朝三暮四喜新厌旧的习性，就决定了这种“喜欢”持续不了多久。
chunks.en: Human's fickle nature determines that this kind of 'like' will not last long.

chunks.zh: 颜值是亲密关系中最没价值的东西，贬值速度也是最快的。
chunks.en: Appearance is the most worthless thing in a close relationship, and its depreciation rate is also the fastest.

chunks.zh: 并且亲密关系中遇到问题，也是没办法靠美貌这些外在属性摆平的，否则世界上就不存在俊男美女们面临感情危机甚至离婚了。
chunks.en: And when problems arise in intimate relationships, they cannot be solved by external attributes such as beauty, otherwise there would be no handsome men and beautiful women facing emotional crises or even divorce in the world.

chunks.zh: OP 没必要因为她的拒绝而感到受伤甚至困扰，或是对自我价值产生怀疑。
chunks.en: OP doesn't need to feel hurt or even troubled by her rejection, or to doubt their self-worth.

chunks.zh: 在医学角度的 BMI 、腰围身高比这些身体数据在健康的范围内，就是很好的状态，也是值得称赞和骄傲的。
chunks.en: From a medical point of view, BMI, waist-to-height ratio, and other body data within a healthy range are a good state and are worthy of praise and pride.

chunks.zh: 你不是她喜欢(偏好)的口味，仅此而已，并不意味着你有问题。
chunks.en: You are not her preferred taste, that's all, it doesn't mean you have a problem.

chunks.zh: 不喜欢吃辣的某个人，会拒绝川菜，但这不意味着川菜是有问题的，川菜本身的精致与价值也不会因此受到影响。
chunks.en: Someone who doesn't like spicy food will refuse Sichuan cuisine, but that doesn't mean there's anything wrong with Sichuan cuisine, and the exquisiteness and value of Sichuan cuisine itself will not be affected.

chunks.zh: 是她不懂得欣赏你，她一个人的主观评价并不能定义你的全部。
chunks.en: She doesn't know how to appreciate you, and her subjective evaluation alone cannot define all of you.

chunks.zh: 相貌偏好是非常主观且多元的的东西，美的标准从来都不是单一的。
chunks.en: Appearance preference is a very subjective and diverse thing, and the standard of beauty has never been singular.

chunks.zh: @gpt5 不发，丢人
chunks.en: @gpt5 Don't post it, it's embarrassing.

chunks.zh: 虽然肯定是要早见面但是“然后微信上互相介绍了各自的条件，都觉得挺合适的，然后就日常闲聊，发现三观和日常爱好也都很一致，然后女生也很主动，聊天也逐渐升温，都到了讨论假如在一起多久订婚多久结婚的地步了，我就有种彷佛遇到了命中注定的那个人的感觉”这个部分，不代表女生对你真的满意了，这里其实女生还是因为段位比你高，在微信上可以给你营造一个氛围其实你还在这位高情商女生的考察期内
chunks.en: Although it is definitely necessary to meet early, that part where "then we introduced our conditions to each other on WeChat, and we both felt it was quite suitable, then we chatted casually, and found that our values and daily hobbies were very consistent, and then the girl was very active, and the chat gradually heated up, and we even discussed how long to get engaged and how long to get married if we were together, and I had a feeling that I had met my destiny," doesn't mean the girl is really satisfied with you. Here, the girl is actually creating an atmosphere for you because her level is higher than yours, and you're still in the high-EQ girl's assessment period on WeChat.

chunks.zh: @shadowyue 其实正好相反，我不觉得自己帅，头像就是为了节省相互的时间，大部分女生看到我的头像基本不回我消息的，她挺主动，我以为她能接受的
chunks.en: @shadowyue Actually, it's the opposite. I don't think I'm handsome. The avatar is to save each other's time. Most girls don't reply to my messages when they see my avatar. She was very proactive, and I thought she could accept it.

chunks.zh: 真是造孽啊，不过也正常，婆娘和男人一样，大部分也都是视觉动物。
chunks.en: It's really a sin, but it's normal. Women, like men, are mostly visual animals.

chunks.zh: 我估计在座的都喜欢长得好看的女生，不喜欢丑的，我就不一样了，我就喜欢丑的。
chunks.en: I guess everyone here likes good-looking girls and doesn't like ugly ones, but I'm different, I like ugly ones.

chunks.zh: 这种情况都不能激发你减肥，对糖油混合物是真爱啊！
chunks.en: This situation can't inspire you to lose weight, you must really love sugar and oil mixtures!

chunks.zh: 肥胖意味着你的自控力较差，认知能力（健康方面）也差。
chunks.en: Obesity means you have poor self-control and poor cognitive ability (in terms of health).

chunks.zh: 推导到 10~20 年之后，她可能就要伺候躺病床上的你，而且极有可能是一辈子，她当然不乐意了。
chunks.en: If you extrapolate to 10-20 years later, she may have to take care of you in bed, and it is very likely to be for the rest of her life. Of course, she is not happy about that.

chunks.zh: 建议：开始进行健康管理，找回活力四射的自己先看几本书，了解身体健康的框架思维，然后把自己错误的生活行为，Top3 停掉。《吃出健康好身材》 范志红的《你是你吃出来的（慢病怎么吃）》 夏萌的《你是你吃出来的（吃对少生病）》夏萌的
chunks.en: Recommendation: Start health management, regain your vitality. First, read a few books to understand the framework of physical health, and then stop the top 3 of your wrong lifestyle behaviors. 《Eat Your Way to a Healthy Body》, Fan Zhihong's 《You Are What You Eat (How to Eat for Chronic Diseases)》, Xia Meng's 《You Are What You Eat (Eat Right to Get Less Sick)》, Xia Meng's

chunks.zh: 发照片，让兄弟们看看，到底丑不丑。
chunks.en: Post a picture, let the brothers see if you're really ugly.

chunks.zh: 能接受瘦的你，证明长相差距不大。
chunks.en: If she can accept you when you're thin, it proves that the difference in appearance is not that big.

chunks.zh: 别急。
chunks.en: Don't rush.

chunks.zh: 慢慢来，机会还很大。
chunks.en: Take your time, there are still plenty of opportunities.

chunks.zh: release 前还是要灰度测试一版 再就是测试数据不要 hardcode
chunks.en: Before the release, you should still do a grayscale test version, and the test data should not be hardcoded.

chunks.zh: 微信头像换成这个
chunks.en: Change your WeChat profile picture to this

chunks.zh: 看标题还以为你 pass 女方，感觉相亲女方颜控还是比较少见的，更多的是看男方钱包鼓不鼓。
chunks.en: Looking at the title, I thought you passed on the girl. I feel that it's relatively rare for girls on blind dates to be obsessed with looks. More often, they look at how fat the guy's wallet is.

chunks.zh: 老哥开始怀念曾经年轻帅气的自己了吗
chunks.en: Are you starting to miss your younger, handsome self?

chunks.zh: 虽然楼主瘦下来就可能挽回，但是建议再谨慎一点，即使你瘦了，对方也可能突然发现你哪和对方设想的不一样又不行了，相亲也别剃头挑子一头热，没见面就命中注定说明你单身太久了。
chunks.en: Although the poster may be able to salvage it by losing weight, I suggest being more cautious. Even if you lose weight, the other party may suddenly find something different from what they imagined and it won't work. Don't be too enthusiastic about blind dates. Saying it's destiny before meeting means you've been single for too long.

chunks.zh: @liu731 不见面，聊这么久也不打视频。
chunks.en: @liu731 You chatted for so long without meeting or even video chatting.

chunks.zh: 又不是飞鸽传书年代，属实抽象
chunks.en: It's not like the days of carrier pigeons, it's really absurd.

chunks.zh: 等面试过了，还有笔试啊！
chunks.en: After passing the interview, there's still a written test!
